name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Integrations
description: This is a repository of integrations APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Zencoder
apis.description: Audio and video encoding/transcoding software as a service. Convert videos online into web and mobile formats using our cloud encoding API.

apis.name: Runscope
apis.description: API performance monitoring. Everything is going to be 200 OK

apis.name: moltin
apis.description: The comprehensive eCommerce API infrastructure for any platform. Moltin handles data storage and eCommerce logic in the cloud so that you can focus on creating great customer experiences.

apis.name: Load Impact
apis.description: Load Impact is a cloud-based SaaS for load testing and website optimization.   We offer load testing and reporting as a service. Try it for free at www.loadimpact.com

apis.name: Workato
apis.description: Workato helps anyone create powerful, business critical integrations between cloud apps in minutes. No IT. No developers required. At Workato we are passionate about creating an enterprise grade, rich and secure service to integrate your apps but with the soul of some of the most beloved consumer services by being simple, fun, self-service, community based and inexpensive. Business users, yes, those of you that sign up for or use cloud based applications can now also connect them together using Workato.

apis.name: AWS API Gateway
apis.description: Amazon API Gateway is a fully managed service that makes it easy for developers to create, publish, maintain, monitor, and secure APIs at any scale. With a few clicks in the AWS Management Console, you can create an API that acts as a front door for applications to access data, business logic, or functionality from your back-end services, such as workloads running on Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud, code running on AWS Lambda, or any Web application. Amazon API Gateway handles all the tasks involved in accepting and processing up to hundreds of thousands of concurrent API calls, including traffic management, authorization and access control, monitoring, and API version management. Amazon API Gateway has no minimum fees or startup costs. You pay only for the API calls you receive and the amount of data transferred out.

apis.name: Azuqua
apis.description: Azuqua helps people integrate their applications and automate their business critical processes without code or specialized skills.

apis.name: Ship Station
apis.description: ShipStation is a web-based shipping solution that streamlines the order fulfillment process for your online business. ShipStation consolidates orders from over 70 ecommerce channels, creates shipping labels, packing slips, and pick lists in batch, communicates tracking information to your customers, provides endless automation, filters, and views, wireless printing, a mobile app, and a lot more.

apis.name: CollabNet
apis.description: CollabNet is a software development and delivery solutions provider headquartered in South San Francisco, California.

apis.name: Dezrez
apis.description: Cloud based estate agent software , sales & letting agent software, estate agent website design and property management software - Dezrez  Services
